Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.gltf

Interface GltfData


  • public interface GltfData
    Represents the glTF data obtained from a glTF file.

    This class also provides methods for operating the glTF data.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int INVALID_INDEX
      Indicates the index of an invalid scene.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getBaseUri​()
      Obtains the root URI for locating external resources.
      int getDefaultSceneIndex​()
      Obtains the default scene index.
      String getError​()
      Obtains the error message if an error occurs in obtaining the glTF data.
      List<String> getExternalUris​()
      Obtains the URIs of the indexes of a parsed glTF file.
      String getGltfUri​()
      Obtains the URI of the source glTF data.
      int getSceneCount​()
      Obtains the number of scenes where glTF data is imported.
      int getThumbnailCount​()
      Obtains the number of available thumbnails.
      boolean isValid​()
      Checks whether the glTF data is valid.
      void release​()
      Releases the glTF data.
      void releaseBuffers​()
      Releases glTF data buffers.

    • Field Detail

      • INVALID_INDEX

        static final int INVALID_INDEX
        Indicates the index of an invalid scene.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        boolean isValid​()
        Checks whether the glTF data is valid. If the glTF data is valid, it must be loaded correctly.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the glTF data is valid; returns false otherwise.

      • getError

        String getError​()
        Obtains the error message if an error occurs in obtaining the glTF data.
        Returns:
        Returns the error message if it is obtained; returns an empty string if the glTF data is valid.

      • releaseBuffers

        void releaseBuffers​()
        Releases glTF data buffers. This method is used to release the memory occupied by the glTF data that has been loaded. The released glTF data buffers can be automatically loaded again as needed.

      • release

        void release​()
        Releases the glTF data. The released glTF data can no longer be used.

      • getSceneCount

        int getSceneCount​()
        Obtains the number of scenes where glTF data is imported.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of scenes where glTF data is imported.

      • getDefaultSceneIndex

        int getDefaultSceneIndex​()
        Obtains the default scene index.
        Returns:
        Returns the default scene index if it is found; returns INVALID_INDEX if the default scene is not specified.

      • getThumbnailCount

        int getThumbnailCount​()
        Obtains the number of available thumbnails.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of available thumbnails.

      • getExternalUris

        List<String> getExternalUris​()
        Obtains the URIs of the indexes of a parsed glTF file. The URIs are relative to getBaseUri(). For example, the URI can be the name of an image or .bin file used by the glTF file.
        Returns:
        Returns the URIs of the indexes of the parsed glTF file.

      • getGltfUri

        String getGltfUri​()
        Obtains the URI of the source glTF data.
        Returns:
        Returns the URI of the source glTF data.

      • getBaseUri

        String getBaseUri​()
        Obtains the root URI for locating external resources.
        Returns:
        Returns the root URI for locating external resources.
